title: gold 1 lf team
body: hi there, gold Midlaner lf team, can also adc but not as well as mid, looking for a ranked team to play with, my team is abit inactive i made due to exams and loss of interest of league of other members, (team achieved gold 1) add me in-game. I am fine with being a sub, pref not low elo teams e.g. silver- :) Thanks
